title: Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Threat Insights
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of aurora protect threat and threat classification events.

definition.content:
[Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security](https://docs.arcticwolf.com/bundle/AES-Overview/page/What-is-Aurora-Endpoint-Security.html) is a unified solution that helpsÂ  to tackle modern threats. It provides comprehensive capabilities to detect and protect against threats across endpoints.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of aurora protect threat and threat classification events.

For more information, see the [Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/arctic_wolf_aurora_platform/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Tracks threats detected on devices, including their status (allowed, blocked, quarantined, waived), classification, and key details such as file name, type, hashes, policy, detection method, and device information. Provides context on updated threat classifications, helping quickly identify unsafe or abnormal files and monitor endpoint threat activity over time.
